Package com.doa.engine.sound

Class DoaSoundClip

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.doa.engine.sound.DoaSoundClip
  • public class DoaSoundClip
extends java.lang.Object
    Easy use version of Clip. Houses a Clip object and some necessary methods and utilities to quickly play, pause and stop arbitrary sound clips.
    Since:
    DoaEngine 1.1
    Version:
    2.7
    Author:
    Doga Oruc
    See Also:
    Clip

    • Method Detail

      • loop

        public void loop​(int count)
        Loops the sound clip this object will play count times.
        Parameters:
        count - loop count

      • play

        public void play()
        Plays the sound clip this object will play from the beginning.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the sound clip. This method will set the microsecond position of the clip to 0.

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Pauses the sound clip. This method will not change the microsecond position of the clip.

      • resume

        public void resume()
        Resumes the sound clip from the microsecond position.
